net.trajano.ms.spi

Interface MicroserviceEngine


  • public interface MicroserviceEngine

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object[] bootstrap()
      Performs the initialization of the microservice engine and returns an array of objects that would be used to bootstrap Spring.
      String hostname()
      Gets the host name of where the engine is running.
      int port()
      Gets the port of where the engine is listening.

    • Method Detail

      • bootstrap

        Object[] bootstrap()
        Performs the initialization of the microservice engine and returns an array of objects that would be used to bootstrap Spring.
        Returns:
        starting context objects.

      • hostname

        String hostname()
        Gets the host name of where the engine is running. This may be null if the engine has not been initialized.
        Returns:
        host name

      • port

        int port()
        Gets the port of where the engine is listening. This may be -1 if the engine has not been initialized.
        Returns:
        host name
